verbs.description: [ARG0: Former President Barack Obama] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: criticized] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's decision to exit the Iran deal , a pillar of Obama 's legacy on foreign policy] .
Former President Barack Obama on Tuesday criticized President Donald Trump 's decision to [V: exit] [ARG1: the Iran deal] , a pillar of Obama 's legacy on foreign policy .
